name: Jesse Anime: Vampire Hunter
description:
LAUNCHING THE GAME MAY TAKE A WHILE

Jesse Anime: Vampire Hunter

Cleanse the town of evil and defeat the manipulating entity

Made by:

Kuju, ShinjiTheRealG, ORANGEJUICE

How To Play:

Move with WASD

Left click for your sword

Right click for your gun

Shift to dash

Space for your ultimate ability

Charge your abilities by getting kills

Issue inputs on the beat (but movement is continuous)
